show_message.name: Show message
show_message.description: Show a ProPresenter message with optional dynamic token values. Use the message UUID or name to identify the message.

message.name: Message UUID or Name
message.description: UUID or name of the message to show (e.g., "4e677061-f132-4f21-8ddf-84df5cf8a58a" or "Child message")

tokens.name: Token values
tokens.description: Token values as key-value pairs. For example: {"Name": "John Smith"}

refresh_presentation_cache.name: Refresh presentation cache
refresh_presentation_cache.description: Force refresh the cached presentation details. Call this after editing slide notes in ProPresenter to immediately update the sensor values.
